text: The Doomsday planeRussian Next-Generation 'Doomsday Plane' Finally Ready for Action, SputnikNews.com, 28 July 2016, accessed 29 July 2016 is a "third- generation" Airborne Command Post operated by the Russian Air Force, based on the Ilyushin Il-96-400 commercial aircraft airframe. The aircraft is apparently newly built, as it was reported by the Il-96 production plant, Voronezh Aircraft Production Association, which produced this aircraft. Doomsday plane was delivered on 1 August 2016. ==Aircraft of comparable role, configuration and/or era== * Boeing E-4 * Boeing E-6 Mercury * Northrop Grumman E-10 MC2A * Ilyushin Il-80 ==See also== * Doomsday plane * Dead Hand (nuclear war) ==References== Category:Ilyushin aircraft Category:Nuclear command and control Category:Strategic Rocket Forces
